Adeptus Titanicus: The Horus Heresy.Opis:
Adeptus Titanicus is a tabletop game of devastating combat between awe-inspiring god-machines, set during the civil war that tore the galaxy apart. Two players take control of a variety of Titans – colossal, bipedal war engines covered in thick armour and weapons which can level a city in a single salvo. It is a strategic challenge in which you pit your skill and cunning against your opponent in a battle to the death; a test of tactical skill demanding the management of the resources at your disposal, determining the optimal reactions to the evolving state of the battlefield.

In this boxed set you will find:

– 1x 96-page softcover Adeptus Titanicus rulebook. This contains the full rules for the game, and will teach you the basics as well as introducing you to advanced rules and tactics, and three different ways to play.
– 1x Reaver Battle Titan. This plastic model comes with chainfist, volcano cannon, melta cannon and turbo laser destructor options. It is supplied with a 105mm round base.
– 1x Reaver Battle Titan. This plastic model comes with power fist, laser blaster, gatling blaster and Apocalypse missile launcher options. It is supplied with a 105mm round base.
– 2x Warhound Scout Titan. These plastic models each come in 62 components, including multiple weapons options. Each has an 80mm round base.
– 2x Cerastus Knight. This 58-component plastic kit includes two 50mm round bases.
– 6x Battlefield Assets, plastic models used to represent stratagems on the battlefield that can interact with your Titans in different ways
– 58x Status Markers and Movement Template Set
– 20x Adeptus Titanicus Dice (18x D6, 2x D10)
– 3x Adeptus Titanicus Weapon Templates
– 2x Reference Sheets
– 4x Titan Command Terminals
– 2x Knight Banner Command Terminals
– 24x Mission and Stratagem Cards
– 16x Titan Weapon Cards
– 1x Range Ruler
– 3x Transfer sheets – one each for Reaver Titans, Warhound Titans and Cerastus Knights

Legions Imperialis: Solar Auxilia Arvus.Nazwa: Legions Imperialis: Solar Auxilia Arvus Lighter
Legions Imperialis: Solar Auxilia Arvus.Opis: Affectionately known as the “little pig” among Solar Auxilia aircrews, the Arvus Lighter is a reliable armoured shuttle used for ferrying Lasrifle Sections across the battlefield. This box contains eight plastic Arvus Lighters, and a Solar Auxilia vehicle transfer sheet with 288 transfers.

Legions Imperialis: Land Raider Proteus.Nazwa: Legions Imperialis: Land Raider Proteus Explorator Squadron
Legions Imperialis: Land Raider Proteus.Opis: Land Raiders are the ubiquitous, heavily armoured workhorses of the Legions Astartes, and the Proteus Explorator is a variant designed for forward operations, depositing troops to the front and laying down supporting fire with twin-linked lascannons. This box contains six Land Raider Proteus miniatures and a vehicle transfer sheet with 1,130 decals.

Legions Imperialis: Warhound Titans with.Nazwa: Legions Imperialis: Warhound Titans with Ursus Claws and Melta Lances
Legions Imperialis: Warhound Titans with.Opis: Loping into battle ahead of larger Titans, Warhounds are savage hunters with an array of powerful weapons they use to destroy infantry, vehicles, and smaller Titans alike. This plastic kit contains two Warhound Titans and a brand-new frame of plastic weapons. You get two sets of ursus claws, natrix shock lances, volkite eradicators, missile pods (which can be built as shudder missiles or swarmer missiles), and Incisor-pattern melta lances, plus a transfer sheet with 118 transfers, and a set of Command Terminals and Weapon Cards so you can use these miniatures in games of Adeptus Titanicus.

Legions Imperialis: Dire Wolf Heavy Scou.Nazwa: Legions Imperialis: Dire Wolf Heavy Scout Titans
Legions Imperialis: Dire Wolf Heavy Scou.Opis: Stalking behind the nimble Warhound Scout Titans, Dire Wolf Heavy Scout Titans have thicker armour plating and carry weapons usually reserved for larger classes of Titan. This box contains two plastic Dire Wolf Heavy Scout Titans armed with a pair of arm-mounted Ardex mega-bolters, and a choice of volcano cannon, conversion beam dissipator, or neutron laser. You also get a transfer sheet with 118 transfers and a set of Command Terminals and Weapon Cards so you can use these miniatures in games of Adeptus Titanicus.

Legions Imperialis: Warmaster Heavy Batt.Nazwa: Legions Imperialis: Warmaster Heavy Battle Titan
Legions Imperialis: Warmaster Heavy Batt.Opis: Zanurz się w epickim świecie Warhammer The Horus Heresy z zestawem "Warmaster Heavy Battle Titan" od Games Workshop. Te gigantyczne maszyny dotychczas ukrywane przed oczyma wiernymi zostały wypuszczone w trakcie Herezji Horusa jako ostateczna broń prawa i porządku, gniewu i zemsty imperatora. Chociaż niewiele jest tych żeliwnych molochów, destrukcja jaką ze sobą niosą jest bezlitosna. Ziemia rozbija się pod ich nogami i nie ma rzeczy która je zatrzyma.

Legions Imperialis: WARBRINGER NEMESIS T.Nazwa: Legions Imperialis: WARBRINGER NEMESIS TITAN WITH QUAKE CANNON
Legions Imperialis: WARBRINGER NEMESIS T.Opis: Zanurz się w epickim świecie Warhammer The Horus Heresy z zestawem "WARBRINGER NEMESIS TITAN WITH QUAKE CANNON" od Games Workshop. Te tytaniczne mechy służą jako wariant ciężkiej artylerii. Wyposażone w różne warianty kolosalnych dział przymocowanych do czubków pancerzy są jak chodzące czołgi o niezwykle wysokim potencjale destrukcyjnym.

Legions Imperialis: WARHOUND SCOUT TITAN.Opis: Zanurz się w epickim świecie Warhammer The Horus Heresy z zestawem "WARHOUND SCOUT TITANS" od Games Workshop. Najmniejsze spośród jednostek klasy tytanicznej, dalej niosą popłoch i zniszczenie na polach walki, jednakże w obliczu walki z innymi tytanami muszą opierać się głównie na swojej mobilności i stosować szereg skomplikowanych taktyk. Jest to najlżej uzbrojona klasa tytana, jednakże nadrabiając swoją największą prędkością służą jako niezastąpiona jednostka zwiadowcza dla formacji tytanów.

Legions Imperialis: Medusa and Basilisk.Nazwa: Legions Imperialis: Medusa and Basilisk Batteries
Legions Imperialis: Medusa and Basilisk.Opis: The Solar Auxilia deploy Medusa and Basilisk batteries to pulverise their enemies with ground-shaking barrages, soften up fortifications, and disorientate enemy formations. This box contains eight miniatures which can be built as either Auxilia Medusa Batteries or Auxilia Basilisk Batteries, and comes with a transfer sheet with 288 decals.

Legions Imperialis: Legiones Astartes –.Nazwa: Legions Imperialis: Legiones Astartes – Drop Pods
Legions Imperialis: Legiones Astartes –.Opis: Among the forms of warfare practised by the Legiones Astartes, the Drop Pod assault is without a doubt the most iconic. Armoured capsules launched from orbiting spacecraft, Drop Pods convey companies of Space Marines directly into the heart of battle. This box builds four Drop Pods with hinged doors, either as standard Legion Drop Pods or Deathstorm Drop Pods, which are packed with missile launchers. You also get a transfer sheet with 1,130 vehicle transfers on.

Legions Imperialis: Dracosan Transport D.Opis: Give your Solar Auxilia infantry sections the luxury of resting their feet by shipping them to the thick of combat in capacious Dracosan Transport Tanks. This box contains six roomy epic scale vehicles that can each be equipped with your choice of twin lascannon or demolisher cannon to provide fire support after disgorging their cargo of troops.

Legions Imperialis: Solar Auxilia – Stor.Opis: Stormhammers are rolling fortresses equipped with a veritable arsenal of high-powered weaponry, frequently seen rumbling into battle alongside Solar Auxilia Tercios and columns of smaller tanks to crush their enemies. This box provides you with two of these formidable super-heavy tanks at epic scale, both of which can built with a choice of multi-laser or lascannon sponsons.

Legions Imperialis: Solar Auxilia – Malc.Nazwa: Legions Imperialis: Solar Auxilia – Malcador Squadron
Legions Imperialis: Solar Auxilia – Malc.Opis: The core of many Solar Auxilia armies are made up from squadrons of tanks, like the Maclador, which has its origins in the Age of Strife on Old Earth. Thanks to its powerful (and highly temperamental) drive system, this heavily armoured and powerfully armed tank is surprisingly fast, able to punch forward into the enemy battle line with great haste. This box contains four epic scale Malcador Heavy Tanks, which can each be equipped with various weapons, including a Malcador battle cannon, twin lascannons, or a Vanquisher battle cannon as its main armament.

Legions Imperialis: Legiones Astartes –.Nazwa: Legions Imperialis: Legiones Astartes – Legion Fast Attack
Legions Imperialis: Legiones Astartes –.Opis: Help your Space Marines perform rapid strikes and flex to the shifting flow of battle with this collection of nippy vehicles and cavalry, which covers everything from rugged bikes to heavily armed skimmers. One box contains four bases of Outriders, six bases of Scimitar Jetbikes, four hefty Javelin Land Speeders, and four Land Speeders, for a total of 32 epic scale miniatures.

Legions Imperialis: Legiones Astartes –.Nazwa: Legions Imperialis: Legiones Astartes – Dreadnought Drop Pods
Legions Imperialis: Legiones Astartes –.Opis: Hurl your Dreadnoughts right into the thick of the action by launching them straight from orbiting battleships in heavily armoured Dreadnought Drop Pods. This pack contains four epic scale Dreadnought Drop Pods with opening doors, which can also be built as Palisade Drop Pods – a new variant loaded with a heavy shield generator which creates an ordnance-blocking field for your troops to hunker down within.

Legions Imperialis: Legiones Astartes –.Nazwa: Legions Imperialis: Legiones Astartes – Sicaran Squadron
Legions Imperialis: Legiones Astartes –.Opis: The Sicaran battle tank is an advanced vehicle designed as part of a joint venture between Ferrus Manus and Roboute Guilliman. Fast for its size and packing a hefty punch, this extremely mobile tank exemplifies the Legiones Astartes’ ruthless approach to warfare. This box contains four epic scale tanks, which can each be armed with either twin-linked accelerator autocannon or omega plasma array, and a choice of sponson-mounted heavy bolters or lascannons.

Legions Imperialis: Legions Imperialis: Solar Auxilia Battle Group

Legions Imperialis: Solar Auxilia: Leman.Nazwa: Legions Imperialis: Solar Auxilia: Leman Russ Strike Squadron
Legions Imperialis: Solar Auxilia: Leman.Opis: Need even more Leman Russ squadrons to roll over the enemies of mankind? Add another eight Strike tanks to your roster with the choice between a versatile battle cannon and the anti-tank Vanquisher cannon. You also get to pick between a heavy bolter or lascannon on the hull.

Legions Imperialis: Legiones Astartes: P.Nazwa: Legions Imperialis: Legiones Astartes: Predator Squadron
Legions Imperialis: Legiones Astartes: P.Opis: Add armoured support to your Space Marine army with a squadron of iconic Predator tanks, packing either a Predator cannon or twin-linked lascannons, with a choice of heavy bolter or lascannon sponsons. You get six tanks in a box, along with a sheet of 1,118 decals.

Legions Imperialis – The Devastation of.Nazwa: Legions Imperialis – The Devastation of Tallarn
Legions Imperialis – The Devastation of.Opis: Ta książka w twardej oprawie wprowadza kilka odmian kampanii Legions Imperialis, takich jak zaawansowana kampania Przełom, w której celem jest pokonanie twierdz wroga, lub kampania Północne Spustoszenie, która obejmuje bitwy Mgła Wojny i Szturm Włóczni. Dostępne są również odznaczenia bojowe, oddziały weteranów, formacje legend oraz nowe formacje i oddziały dla Legiones Astartes i Solar Auxilia.

Blood Bowl Second Season Edition.Opis: Blood Bowl: Second Season edition to nowa odsłona klasycznej gry Games Workshop. Nowa edycja zapowiada największe zmiany zasad od momentu powstania systemu i ma zapewnić gładszą rozgrywkę w każdym aspekcie gry. Blood Bowl jest grą fantasy pozwalającą nam rozgrywać mecze futbolu amerykańskiego pomiędzy drużynami z uniwersum Warhammera. Kombinacja strategii, taktyki i całkowitej bezmyślnej przemocy stanowi esencję futbolu w świecie fantasy. Dwóch graczy wciela się w trenerów wybierając spośród najróżniejszych przedstawicieli Starego Świata. Blood Bowl to nie tylko gra planszowa ale również gra strategiczna za pomocą, której będziecie mogli rozgrywać pojedyncze gry sparingowe, turnieje, ligi oraz mini gry.  Zestaw startowy pozwala na rozegranie brutalnych meczy pomiędzy dwiema całkiem nowymi drużynami: Ludzi - Imperialnych Arystokratów i dzikich Czarnych Orków. Obie drużyny są kompletne - tak, NAPRAWDĘ kompletne - z własnymi zaktualizowanymi modelami Star Player i Big Guy, więc w zestawie znajdziesz wszystko, czego potrzebujesz, aby rozgrywać mecze przez całą ligę, zaraz po wyjęciu z pudełka. Baronowie z Bögenhafen są prowadzeni przez legendarnego asa drużyny Griffa Oberwalda i przywieźli też ze sobą Ogra, aby wzmocnić swoje możliwości ofensywne. Zespół Imperialnych Arystokratów jest bardziej krzykliwy, bardziej skupiony na j grze mobilnej i obronie, w porównaniu ze standardową drużyną ludzi.

Blood Bowl: Ogre Team Pitch & Dugouts 20.Nazwa: Blood Bowl: Ogre Team Pitch & Dugouts 2021
Blood Bowl: Ogre Team Pitch & Dugouts 20.Opis:
OGRE TEAM PITCH & DUGOUTS - Stadiony ogrów byłyby niezmiernie piękne, 
położone wysoko w górach, jak to często bywa, gdyby nie plamy krwi i kratery 
pełne zebranych kości. Jeśli lubisz takie rzeczy, jest to niezwykle ładne. Jeśli 
nie, mogą być trochę mniej niż przyjazne.OGRE TEAM PITCH & DUGOUTS - Po 
jednej stronie boiska znajduje się jałowe, skaliste pole, nad którym dominuje 
ząbkowany dół z twarzą ogra, wypełniony szczątkami ich ostatniej drużyny lub 
posiłkiem, jak lubią to nazywać. Po drugiej stronie znajduje się to samo boisko, 
ale pokryte śniegiem po zimowej zamieci, z kilkoma złowieszczymi czerwonymi 
„oznaczeniami” dla stref końcowych…OGRE TEAM PITCH & DUGOUTS 
-   Znajdziesz również parę dopasowanych dwustronnych lawek 
rezerwowych, aby uzupełnić temat. Zaprojektowana na nowo z myślą o najnowszej 
edycji gry, każdy z boksów zawiera liczniki punktów, tur i przerzutów, a także 
pola rezerw, znokautowanych i poszkodowanych. Uwzględniono zasady korzystania z 
każdej strony boiska.

Blood Bowl Nurgle Team Pitch & Dugouts.Nazwa: Blood Bowl Nurgle Team Pitch & Dugouts
Blood Bowl Nurgle Team Pitch & Dugouts.Opis:
Nurgle 
Pitch to dwustronne boisko do gry w Blood  Bowl, w komplecie z dopasowanymi 
dug-out'ami, jest idealnym miejscem do gry dla  drużyn z 
Nurgle.
Nurgle Pitch ma  jedną stronę reprezentującą piękny 
kwitnący Garden of Nurgle, a druga strona  jest "samozapłodniona"- z tego powodu 
istnieje o wiele więcej niebezpieczeństw,  z rozkwitniętymi roślinami, kałużami 
szlamu i ogromną wielką potworną  
macką.
Nurgle 
Pitch  ma taką samą  specyfikację, jak plansza dołączona 
do gry w pudełku z i zawiera zasady gry z  lepkim życiem roślin, próbując 
powstrzymać twój  mecz.

Blood Bowl: Reikland Reavers.Opis:
Reikland Reavers 
Blood Bowl znani podczas pierwszych sezonów jako Altdorf Acolytes, szybko okryli 
się sławą i reputacją a po kilku udanych występach zmieni nazwę na Reikland 
Reavers.

Blood Bowl to bardzo stary zespół, który może poszczycić się wielowiekową

Blood Bowl: Ogre - Blood Bowl.Opis:
Blood Bowl Ogre 
jest dobrym zawodnikiem, dobrym choć prostym! Zgnieść, zmiażdżyć, złamać i 
rozbić to jedne z nielicznych komend jakie będziesz mógł mu wydać. Doskonale 
nadaje się do przebijania przez nawet najtwardszych 
przeciwników.

Blood Bowl: The Doom Lords / Chaos Chose.Opis:
Blood Bowl The Doom 
Lords to drużyna zebrana przez tajemniczego "The Overfiend". Wynajął najlepszych 
trenerów i zawarł mroczne pakty z demonicznymi bytami, żeby zdobyć najlepszych 
zawodników, a ci, którzy odmówili szybko się przekonali, że zbyt dosłownie 
traktuje zwrot „headhunter”...
Blood Bowl The Doom Lords to 
wieloczęściowy zestaw pozwalający złożyć zespół 4 blokerów Chaosu i 8 
zwierzoludzi.
Blood Bowl The Doom Lords - W 
zestawie znajduje się wiele dodatków - 2 znaczniki zwrotu, 2 dwustronne monety 
punktowe w kształcie gwiazd Chaosu i 6 piłek. Dostarczany z 12 podstawami 32 
mm.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Shuri and Okoy.Opis:
Shuri 
 - sister to T’Challa, the Black Panther - has proven herself a hero through her 
 innate genius and fierce dedication to her people. With her spirited 
personality  and intellectual prowess, Shuri has become the top innovator and 
inventor within  the technologically advanced nation of Wakanda, and she puts 
her innovations to  good use to defend her home and its people by whatever means 
necessary.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Colossus & Mag.Opis: Born in Siberia, Piotr Rasputin is a mutant with a skin of steel and a heart of gold. He can transform his entire body into organic metal, granting him superhuman strength, durability, and stamina. Colossus is a gentle giant, however. He is sometimes reluctant to use his physical strength in combat, feeling a responsibility to use his powers to improve the lives of mutants and humankind.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Juggernaut.Opis:
Cain 
Marko is the Juggernaut, a human wrecking ball of unstoppable force who lays 
waste to everything unlucky enough to be in his path. He was once an average 
human before discovering the Crimson Gem of Cyttorak, a conduit to the power of 
the deity of the Crimson Cosmos, that transformed Marko into the Juggernaut. 
Possessing unfathomable strength and durability, he is among the strongest 
physical beings alive. Juggernaut has endless strength and kinetic power, with 
the ability to shatter mountains, and a mystical force field makes him 
impervious to any harm. Once he gains momentum, nothing on Earth can stop his 
advance.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - X-23 & Honey B.Nazwa: Marvel: Crisis Protocol - X-23 & Honey Badger
Marvel: Crisis Protocol - X-23 & Honey B.Opis:
Laura 
Kinney, or X-23, is the 23rd attempt by the Facility, an offshoot of the Weapons 
Plus Program, to create a genetic copy of the mutant Wolverine. She was born to 
be a living weapon and had minimal human contact to enhance her savage and 
killer instincts. X-23 is a peerless fighter and assassin with all the mutant 
abilities of Wolverine, including a superhuman ability to heal from any injury, 
lightning-fast reflexes, and retractable adamantium-coated claws in her hands 
and feet.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Dormammu.Opis:
The 
ruler of the Dark Dimension enters Marvel: 
Crisis Protocol! One of an enigmatic race of beings made of pure 
mystical energy, Dormammu possesses patience that can be measured in eons; he 
has intelligence beyond reckoning and command of the mystical arts to match.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Blade & Moon K.Nazwa: Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Blade & Moon Knight

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Black Order Af.Nazwa: Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Black Order Affiliation Pack
Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Black Order Af.Opis:
Laura 
Kinney, or X-23, is the 23rd attempt by the Facility, an offshoot of the Weapons 
Plus Program, to create a genetic copy of the mutant Wolverine. She was born to 
be a living weapon and had minimal human contact to enhance her savage and 
killer instincts. X-23 is a peerless fighter and assassin with all the mutant 
abilities of Wolverine, including a superhuman ability to heal from any injury, 
lightning-fast reflexes, and retractable adamantium-coated claws in her hands 
and feet.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Mysterio & Car.Opis:
Quentin 
Beck began a life of crime as a frustrated artist. A successful stunt man and 
special effects creator in Hollywood, he turned to criminal life after failing 
to gain the recognition he thought he deserved. Donning the mantle of Mysterio, 
Beck uses illusions, hypnosis, and trickery to enact his criminal schemes. A 
longtime rival of Spider-Man, Mysterio’s gadgets and intelligence allow him to 
tangle with his super-powered foe.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Black Swan & S.Nazwa: Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Black Swan & Supergiant
Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Black Swan & S.Opis:
Born 
with a power that is both blessing and curse, the mutant Rogue can absorb the 
powers and memories of anyone she touches. This remarkable but devastating power 
allows her to wield the abilities of her foes but leaves them depleted - or 
worse. Prolonged contact with her skin drains the vital energy from those she 
touches. Afraid to harm those close to her, Rogue fled her past life. A runaway 
from the American South, she started her career as a member of the Brotherhood 
of Mutants under Mystique before joining the X-Men to fight on the side of 
good.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Black Dwarf &.Nazwa: Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Black Dwarf & Ebony Maw
Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Black Dwarf &.Opis:
A 
 master manipulator, Ebony 
 Maw uses his formidable powers to enforce his master 
 Thanos' rule across the galaxy. Unlike his fellow Black Order members, Maw 
 prefers to avoid physical confrontation and instead uses his incredible psychic 
 potential to control and dominate his foes.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Drax & Ronan t.Nazwa: Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Drax & Ronan the Accuser
Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Drax & Ronan t.Opis:
Created 
by the Titan god Kronos to kill Thanos, Drax the 
Destroyer has spent most of his existence trying to 
do exactly that. Despite this one underlying 
purpose, Drax has fought to 
save the universe time and time again. Following his efforts to stop the 
Annihilation wave, he joined the Guardians of the Galaxy, and he continues to 
fight to protect the innocent and pursue his quest to slay the Mad Titan 
Thanos.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Hawkeye & Blac.Nazwa: Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Hawkeye & Black Widow, Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D.
Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Hawkeye & Blac.Opis:
With 
 only a bow, a quiver of arrows, and enough self-confidence to rival anyone, 
 Clint Barton has proven himself to truly be one of Earth’s Mightiest Heroes. An 
 expert marksman and fighter, Barton puts his talents to good use as the hero 
 Hawkeye.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Red Skull & Hy.Nazwa: Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Red Skull & Hydra Troops
Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Red Skull & Hy.Opis:
The 
Red Skull leads HYDRA in its quest for world domination in this new pack for 
Marvel: Crisis Protocol! Johann Schmidt is a conniving villain whose evil deeds 
span generations. During this time, he has transformed HYDRA into a 
globe-spanning terrorist organization that cannot ever truly be destroyed, for 
"If a head is cut off, two more shall take its place". The new version of the 
Red Skull in this pack introduces the HYDRA Affiliation to Marvel: Crisis 
Protocol while leading a group of HYDRA Troops ready to do his bidding. In 
addition to these miniatures and their abilities, this pack further enhances the 
HYDRA Affiliation with seven Team Tactic cards that give Red Skull and his 
subordinates even more ways to further their plans for world 
domination.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Sentinel Prime.Nazwa: Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Sentinel Prime MK4
Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Sentinel Prime.Opis:
A 
Prime Sentinel leads its robotic brethren into the battles of Marvel: Crisis 
Protocol in this new pack! A higher-level Sentinel that leads the hunt for 
mutants, the Sentinel Prime found in this pack features superior strength, 
weaponry, and protective hulls, making it even more of a threat. Even more 
dangerously, Prime Sentinels learn from every encounter with an enemy and make 
the data available to other Sentinels. Leading the new Sentinels Affiliation, 
the Sentinel Prime works particularly well with Mark IV Sentinels and Cassandra 
Nova. Finally, two Team Tactic cards further enhance its ability to lead the 
Sentinels and expand their sphere of influence.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Sentinel MK IV.Nazwa: Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Sentinel MK IV

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Blob & Pyro.Opis:
The 
immovable Blob and fiery Pyro make their Marvel: Crisis Protocol debut in this 
new pack! Fred Dukes, known to many as the “Blob,” has the superhuman ability to 
become virtually immovable at a whim while in touch with the earth. Joining him 
is St. John Allerdyce, more commonly known as Pyro. Allerdyce can shape fire, 
increasing or diminishing its heat, intensity, and size, making him a menacing 
addition to any team. Together, these characters supplement the Brotherhood of 
Mutants Affiliation with their mutant abilities and three Team Tactic cards that 
give them even more ways to work together with their teammates.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Brotherhood of.Nazwa: Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Brotherhood of Mutants Affiliation Pack
Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Brotherhood of.Opis:
Players 
can begin recruiting their own Brotherhood of Mutants for their games of Marvel: 
Crisis Protocol with this new Marvel: 
Crisis Protocol - Brotherhood of Mutants Affiliation Pack! Bringing 
together highly detailed miniatures of Magneto, Mystique, Sabretooth, and Toad 
in one package, this pack gives players everything they need to begin playing 
with the Brotherhood of Mutants Affiliation. Along with these miniatures, 
players will also find the stat cards for these characters featuring new graphic 
design. Rounding out the pack are the Asteroid M, X-Ceptional Healing, Weapon X 
Program, Magnetic Refraction, Magnetic Crush, Heave Ho, The Books of Truth, and 
Deception Team Tactic Cards, ensuring players have everything they need to cut 
down any who oppose their Brotherhood.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Rivals Panels.Nazwa: Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Rivals Panels - Weapon X Program
Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Rivals Panels.Opis:
The 
famous rivalry between two of the deadliest weapons to emerge from the Weapon X 
Program hits the tabletop with Marvel: 
Crisis Protocol - Rivals Panels - Weapon X Program! Logan once counted 
Sabretooth among his few friends as the pair fought beside one another on a 
covert team, but Sabretooth’s unslakeable bloodlust tore the team apart, and now 
they face off as bitter rivals. Featuring beautifully sculpted new miniatures of 
Logan and Sabretooth, this pack adds new versions of these iconic characters to 
players’ rosters and introduces the new Weapon X Program Affiliation to Marvel: 
Crisis Protocol. Additionally, players will also find 6 Team Tactic cards that 
further enhance Logan and Sabretooth’s abilities as well as several props that 
allow players to customize their bases.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Uncanny X-Men.Nazwa: Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Uncanny X-Men Affiliation Pack
Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Uncanny X-Men.Opis:
Players 
can recruit their own Uncanny X-Men for their games of Marvel: Crisis Protocol 
with this new Marvel: 
Crisis Protocol - Uncanny X-Men Affiliation Pack! This pack collects 
highly detailed miniatures of the X-Men Storm, Cyclops, Beast, and Wolverine 
into one convenient package. These miniatures are joined by the stat cards for 
these characters updated with the most recent graphic design. Finally, this pack 
also contains all the Team Tactic cards originally found in CP40 - Wolverine 
& Sabretooth and CP41 - Cyclops & Storm along with the Advanced R&D 
Team Tactic card found in CP43 - Mystique & Beast, ensuring players have 
everything they need to defend mutantkind from any threat.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Earth's Mighti.Nazwa: Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Earth's Mightiest Core Set

PAKIET Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Earth's.Nazwa: PAKIET Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Earth's Mightiest Core Set + Gratisy
PAKIET Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Earth's.Opis: The battle continues with the Earth's Mightiest Core Set for Marvel: Crisis Protocol! Featuring 13 all-new miniatures of iconic heroes and villains, this set invites players to assemble their own team from across the Marvel Universe and leap back into battles of cataclysmic proportions. Beyond choosing their teams, this set also empowers players to customize every aspect of their Marvel: Crisis Protocol experience with 26 terrain miniatures to build their battlefields, 6 new Crisis Cards featuring new scenarios, and 20 Team Tactic cards that fine-tune their teams' abilities.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Cosmic Ghost R.Nazwa: Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Cosmic Ghost Rider

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Kingdom of Wak.Nazwa: Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Kingdom of Wakanda Terrain Pack
Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Kingdom of Wak.Opis: The Kingdom of Wakanda comes to the tabletop in Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Kingdom of Wakanda Terrain Pack! Featuring a variety of terrain pieces from this technologically advanced nation, including lamps, a tree, and a vibranium transport, this pack allows players to customize their own Wakandan battlefields. Along with these terrain pieces, players will also find a new One-Shot card that invites them to modify their Crisis into a unique scenario focusing on the terrain they find in this pack.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Icons of Bast.Nazwa: Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Icons of Bast Terrain Pack
Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Icons of Bast.Opis: Players can add even more Wakanda-themed terrain to their Marvel: Crisis Protocol battlefields in Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Icons of Bast Terrain Pack! Great statues of panthers honoring Bast and Wakanda's royal line are erected throughout this proud nation, and this pack brings a variety of these statues to the tabletop. Featuring a large panther statue, two small panther statues, and a panther fountain, this pack gives players even more terrain to make Wakanda the backdrop for their Marvel: Crisis Protocol battles. Rounding out the pack is a One-Shot Card that invites players to modify their Crisis into a unique scenario focusing on the terrain in this pack.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Bishop & Night.Opis: Two iconic mutants join Marvel: Crisis Protocol in Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Bishop & Nightcrawler! With his mutant ability to teleport, Nightcrawler is able to land a decisive blow or help get his teammates out of the line of fire at the perfect moment. He is joined by Bishop, who wields advanced weaponry and his mutant ability to absorb and redirect energy in tandem. Together, they enhance any team, but especially the Uncanny X-Men and X-Force affiliations with their abilities and 3 Team Tactic cards.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Professor X &.Nazwa: Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Professor X & Shadow King
Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Professor X &.Opis: Players will dominate the battlefield’s Astral Plane with the Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Professor X & Shadow King. Both Professor X and Shadow King are mystic manipulators, with unique battlefield alteration abilities. Equipped with Team Tactic Cards that foster devious counterplay, these mental duelists are ready to boggle their opponents’ minds!

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Rival Panels -.Nazwa: Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Rival Panels - Battle for the Throne

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Klaw and MBaku.Nazwa: Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Klaw and MBaku
Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Klaw and MBaku.Opis: Two new characters with ties to the kingdom of Wakanda enter Marvel: Crisis Protocol in this new pack! Existing as a sentient sound-form, Ulysses Klaw terrorizes the world with a sound generator capable of creating high-volume sonic waves and blasts of concussive force. He is joined by the Wakandan chieftain M'Baku, whose prodigious strength often puts him at odds with T'Challa, but whose influence cannot be denied.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Iceman & Shado.Nazwa: Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Iceman & Shadowcat Character Pack
Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Iceman & Shado.Opis: Players will bring youthful exuberance to the table with the Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Iceman & Shadowcat Character Pack. These two fan-favorite X-Men add new low-cost options to the Affiliation. With show-stopping affiliated Team Tactic Cards in tow, these rising stars are the jewel of any mutant Squad on the battlefield.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Mighty Thor, L.Nazwa: Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Mighty Thor, Lady Sif, Thor, Hero of Midgard & Loki, Prince of Lies
Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Mighty Thor, L.Opis: Jane Foster wkracza do gry jako Potężna Thor, wzmocniona magicznym młotem Mjolnirem. Dołączają do niej mistrzyni miecza Lady Sif, Thor, Bohater Midgardu i Loki, Książę Kłamstw! Wszystkie cztery figurki dają hobbystom i graczom nowe możliwości zaangażowania się w nowe postacie ze świeżymi zasadami do włączenia do swoich gier.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Asgard Shrine.Opis: Przenieś epickie bogactwa i chwałę Asgardu na swój stół wraz z Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Asgardian Shrine Terrain Pack. Ta piękna świątynia to rewelacyjny element terenu do rozgrywania spektakularnych bitew. Przedstawia ruiny sanktuarium z oszałamiającym posągiem ku czci Walkirii - jednej z legendarnych wojowniczek Asgardu, która czuwa nad tymi, którzy schronili się w jej siedzibie.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Battle for Asg.Nazwa: Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Battle for Asgard Terrain Pack
Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Battle for Asg.Opis: Ukaż potęgę i piękno Asgardu dzięki dodatkowi Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Battle for Asgard Terrain Pack, pełnemu tematycznych elementów terenu. Zawierają one antyczne, kruszące się kamienne posągi i ruiny, płonące paleniska i nie tylko. Zestaw ten zawiera również opcjonalne zasady, których gracze mogą używać wraz z terenami. aby zapewnić urozmaiconą rozgrywkę.

Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Weapon X & Mav.Nazwa: Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Weapon X & Maverick
Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Weapon X & Mav.Opis: Program Weapon X pojawia się w grze Marvel: Crisis Protocol. Marvel: Crisis Protocol - Weapon X & Maverick to zestaw zawierający nową, dziką, niezniszczalną i niekontrolowaną wersję Wolverine'a oraz Mavericka - byłego bojownika o wolność, który stał się najemnikiem po bolesnych zdarzeniach z przeszłości.

SW Legion - Imperial Death Troopers Unit.Nazwa: SW Legion - Imperial Death Troopers Unit Expansion
SW Legion - Imperial Death Troopers Unit.Opis: Tactically advancing across the battlefields like inhuman revenants, Imperial Death Troopers are a terrifying sight. Adorned in jet black armor and carrying an arsenal of weapons and equipment, these troopers are the elite soldiers of the Tarkin Initiative. Candidates are hand-selected from the Stormtrooper Corps by Imperial Intelligence itself. Trained to be efficient and merciless, they are also rumored to undergo classified medical augmentations.With the Imperial Death Troopers Unit Expansion, you can unleash these elite troops on the battlefields of Star Wars™: Legion. This expansion contains everything you need to add a squad of ruthless death troopers to your Imperial army, including six finely sculpted death trooper miniatures, a unit card, and an array of upgrade cards that give your Death Troopers access to even more advanced weaponry.

Star Wars: Legion - Phase I Clone Troope.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion - Phase I Clone Troopers Unit Expansion
Star Wars: Legion - Phase I Clone Troope.Opis:
The Phase I Clone Troopers Unit Expansion contains a full unit of seven unique, unpainted Phase I Clone miniatures, identical to the Phase I Clone Troopers included in the Star Wars: Legion Clone Wars Core Set. Five Phase I Clone Troopers wielding DC-15A Blaster Rifles are joined by a Z-6 Phase I Trooper and a DC-15 Phase I Trooper. This expansion also includes a unit card and an assortment of upgrade cards, inviting you to customize your Clone Troopers’ gear to fit your battle plan.

Protect democracy across the galaxy with the seven unique, highly detailed miniatures featured in this expansion pack! Five troopers with DC-15A Blaster Rifles appear in different poses while a Phase I Clone Trooper carrying a Z-6 Rotary Blaster Cannon and a DC-15 Phase I Trooper bring heavy weapons to the front lines.

Star Wars: Legion - B1 Battle Droids Uni.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion - B1 Battle Droids Unit Expansion
Star Wars: Legion - B1 Battle Droids Uni.Opis:
The B1 Battle Droids Unit Expansion gives you the chance to supplement your Separatist Alliance forces with even more battle droids. Nine unpainted and finely-sculpted B1 Battle Droid miniatures identical to those found in the Star Wars: Legion Clone Wars Core Set stand ready to form the backbone of your army, including two miniatures carrying heavy weapons. Joining these miniatures are a unit card and a variety of upgrade cards inviting you to make your own personal refinements to your battle droids.

Create a massive droid army with the nine highly-detailed B1 Battle Droid miniatures found in this expansion! Seven Battle Droids can lay down heavy fire with their E-5 Blaster Rifles, while a B1 Trooper with an E-60R poses a threat to enemy vehicles. Finally, an E-5C B1 Trooper adds even more firepower to your battle droids in their quest to bring down the Republic.

Star Wars: Legion - Upgrade Card Pack.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion - Upgrade Card Pack
Star Wars: Legion - Upgrade Card Pack.Opis: Selecting the troops that you’ll lead into battle is only the first step in creating your own Star Wars: Legion army. Once you’ve supplemented your armies with fresh recruits, you can further enhance them with the addition of upgrade cards. Each upgrade unlocks new tactical possibilities for your army, giving you the freedom to customize your units to meet your individual preferences.  While every Unit Expansion contains a variety of upgrade cards that help enhance that particular unit’s natural abilities, the Upgrade Card Pack conveniently puts a vast library of upgrade cards at your fingertips no matter which faction you play. Within this pack, you'll find copies of the following upgrade cards:  5 Command Upgrade Cards 1 Aggressive Tactics 1 Commanding Presence 1 Esteemed Leader 1 Improvised Orders 1 Strict Orders 13 Comms Upgrade Cards 2 Comms Jammer 3 Comms Relay 3 HQ Uplink 3 Linked Targeting Array 2 Long-Range Comlink 5 Force Upgrade Cards 1 Battle Meditation 1 Force Guidance 1 Force Push 1 Force Reflexes 1 Saber Throw 16 Gear Upgrade Cards 2 Electrobinoculars 3 Emergency Stims 3 Environmental Gear 3 Grappling Hooks 3 Recon Intel 2 Targeting Scopes 6 Grenade Upgrade Cards 2 Concussion Grenades 2 Fragmentation Grenades 2 Impact Grenades 15 Training Upgrade Cards 3 Duck and Cover 3 Endurance 3 Hunter 3 Overwatch 3 Tenacity

Star Wars: Legion - NR-N99 Persuader Uni.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion - NR-N99 Persuader Unit Expansion
Star Wars: Legion - NR-N99 Persuader Uni.Opis: This expansion contains everything you need to add a NR-N99 Persuader-class Tank Droid to your Separatist armies as a heavy unit. The beautifully detailed, unpainted miniature features two option B1 battle droids that it can ferry into battle and a unit card outlines all of its weapons and systems. Finally, nine upgrade cards invite you to outfit your NR-N99 Persuaderclass Tank Droid with additional shells, comms, and programming.

Star Wars: Legion - DSD1 Dwarf Spider Dr.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion - DSD1 Dwarf Spider Droid
Star Wars: Legion - DSD1 Dwarf Spider Dr.Opis: Within this expansion, you’ll find everything you need to add a DSD1 Dwarf Spider Droid to your Separatist armies as a support unit. This droids versatile nature is captured in the finely detailed, unpainted hard plastic miniature that can be customized with a nose-mounted laser cannon, flamethrower, or ion blaster. These physical modifications have a practical application in eight upgrade cards that invite you to outfit your DSD1 Dwarf Spider Droid with a variety of weapons and battle protocols.

Star Wars: Legion - IG-100 MagnaGuard.Opis: This expansion puts a troop of six highly detailed, unpainted hard plastic IG-100 MagnaGuard miniatures at your command, enough for two special forces units. In addition to their standard electrostaffs, these miniatures can be assembled with a variety of alternate weaponry, including an RPS-6 rocket launcher, an electro-whip, and a unit leader that can appear with a precision laser dart.

Star Wars: Legion - Shadow Collective St.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion - Shadow Collective Starter Set
Star Wars: Legion - Shadow Collective St.Opis: Whichever path they choose, this set gives players plenty of new options for building their armies with 22 miniatures, including Maul, a unit of Shadow Collective Mandalorian Super Commandos, a unit of Black Sun Enforcers, and a unit of Pyke Syndicate Foot Soldiers. Additionally, players can further customize these forces with 30 upgrade cards that unlock heavy weapons, characters like Rook Kast, and more. Finally, this set also includes three command cards for use with the new mercenaries, three new command cards for Maul, and reprints of Maul’s three Separatist Alliance command cards.

Star Wars: Legion - Priority Supplies Ba.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion - Priority Supplies Battlefield Expansion
Star Wars: Legion - Priority Supplies Ba.Opis:
No matter where the Galactic Civil War takes you, the Star Wars: Legion - Priority Supplies Battlefield Expansion has the miniatures to bring new life to your battlefields.

Your troops may hunker down behind sturdy barricades or desperately maneuver to secure crates, comms stations, and moisture vaporators. With a total of twelve objective miniatures between these two expansions, you’ll have everything you need to bring a new level of Star Wars realism to your games of Star Wars: Legion.

Star Wars: Legion - Boba Fett Operative.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion - Boba Fett Operative Expansion

Star Wars: Legion - Scout Troopers Unit.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion - Scout Troopers Unit Expansion
Star Wars: Legion - Scout Troopers Unit.Opis: Within the Scout Troopers Unit Expansion, you’ll find a squad of seven unpainted, easily assembled Scout Trooper miniatures that can be used to field two different special forces units: a standard squad or a two-miniature strike team. Additionally, the five upgrade cards included with this expansion can be added to the Scout Troopers or another unit, giving you more options for outfitting your Star Wars: Legion armies.

Star Wars: Legion - Emperor Palpatine Co.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion - Emperor Palpatine Commander Expansion

Star Wars: Legion - Imperial Royal Guard.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion - Imperial Royal Guards Unit Expansion

Star Wars Legion - Core Set.Opis: Warfare is an inescapable part of the Star Wars universe, from the Rebel Alliance’s defeat in the Battle of Hoth to a few elite Rebel strike teams taking on a legion of stormtroopers on the Forest Moon of Endor. You can seize your chance to get your boots on the ground and lead your troops to victory with Star Wars™: Legion, a miniatures game of thrilling infantry battles in the Star Wars universe! Star Wars: Legion invites you to enter the ground battles of the Galactic Civil War as the commander of a unique army of miniatures filled with troopers, powerful ground or repulsor vehicles, and iconic characters like Darth Vader or Luke Skywalker. While innovative mechanics for command and control simulate the fog of war and the chaos of battle, the game’s unpainted, easily assembled minis give you a canvas to create the Star Wars army you’ve always wanted to lead into battle—whether you fight for the monolithic, oppressive Galactic Empire or the ragtag Rebel Alliance.

Star Wars: Legion - Blizzard Force Expan.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion - Blizzard Force Expansion - Battle Force Starter Set
Star Wars: Legion - Blizzard Force Expan.Opis: Your players can begin building their invincible Imperial armies and jump into the battles of Star Wars: Legion with this Battle Force! Carrying out the orders of Darth Vader himself, the renowned Blizzard Force crushed the Rebel resistance on Hoth and this Battle Force puts everything players need to construct and play their own Galactic Empire armies at their fingertips, including the commander version of Darth Vader from the Star Wars: Legion Core Set, three units of Imperial Snowtroopers, an AT-ST, a unit of 74-Z Speeder Bikes, and a new Stormtrooper Heavy Response Unit. In addition to these units, players will also find a complete set of basic command cards, reprints of Darth Vader’s three command cards from the Star Wars: Legion Core Set, and three new command cards representing the tactics used by the Imperial forces on Hoth for use exclusively by Blizzard Force. Rounding out this set are 26 reprinted upgrade cards that give aspiring Imperial commanders everything they need to outfit their Battle Force and crush all those that stand in their way.

Star Wars: Legion - Echo Base Defenders.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion - Echo Base Defenders - Battle Force Starter Set
Star Wars: Legion - Echo Base Defenders.Opis: Your players can begin building their Rebel armies making their stand against the Empire with this pack for Star Wars: Legion! The Rebels at Echo Base used their ingenuity and courage to make a stand against an overwhelming Imperial force and this pack captures their rebel spirit with units that form the cornerstone of players’ armies. Featuring four units of Rebel Veterans, two units of Tauntaun Riders, and a 1.4 FD Laser Cannon Team all led by Rebel hero Leia Organa accompanied by Chewbacca, R2-D2 and C-3PO, this pack gives players a stout force to hold off any opponent. Players will also find the Command Cards for Leia Organa, R2-D2, and Chewbacca alongside copies of the four generic Command Cards and three new Command Cards designed for the exclusive use of the Echo Base Defenders Battle Force. Finally, 33 reprinted upgrade cards invite players to fully outfit their Rebel force to fit their strategy.

Star Wars: Legion - 501st Legion - Battl.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion - 501st Legion - Battle Force Starter Kit
Star Wars: Legion - 501st Legion - Battl.Opis: The vaunted 501st Legion joins Star Wars: Legion with this pack! Led by Jedi General Anakin Skywalker and known for its bravery and unorthodox tactics, the 501st is one of the most renowned units in the Grand Army of the Republic and this set puts an impressive fighting force at players’ command. In addition to Skywalker, players will find two units of Phase II Clone Troopers, a Republic AT-RT, and three units of ARC Troopers to build their Republic Battle Force. To ensure these units are operating at peak efficiency, this set also contains three new Command Cards for use by the 501st Legion as well as all of Anakin Skywalker’s Command Cards and copies of the four generic Command Cards. Finally, a set of 32 reprinted upgrade cards gives players everything they need to outfit their legion to fit their strategy.

Star Wars: Legion - Swoop Bike Riders Un.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion - Swoop Bike Riders Unit Expansion
Star Wars: Legion - Swoop Bike Riders Un.Opis: Players speed into battles of Star Wars: Legion with the Swoop Bike Riders Unit Expansion! Whether criminals or freedom fighters, many groups across the galaxy see swoop bikes as the perfect battlefield companions that make their forces even more mobile. The support unit of two Swoop Bike Riders found in this expansion helps players get their forces into the thick of the fight quickly where they can cause the most chaos and destruction before zooming out before the might of planetary authorities can be brought against them. Able to be fielded by either the Rebel Alliance or gangs of mercenaries, these riders add a fast and furious new element to any army. Contains:  2 Plastic Miniatures 1 Unit Card 11 Assorted Tokens 1 Insert Sheet

SW Legion - Phase II Clone Troopers Unit.Nazwa: SW Legion - Phase II Clone Troopers Unit Expansion
SW Legion - Phase II Clone Troopers Unit.Opis:
Within the Phase II Clone Troopers Unit Expansion, you'll find everything you need to deploy an elite corps unit of Phase II Clone Troopers, including seven Phase II Clone Trooper miniatures featuring a variety of customization options. First, the unit's leader can be assembled with or without his helmet. Similarly, a Z-6 Phase II Trooper can be built with or without his helmet or, if you choose, he can carry his signature Z-6 Rotary Blaster or the standard DC-15A Blaster Rifle. Finally, a Phase II Mortar Trooper can lug his mortar into battle stowed on his back or appear with the mortar fully deployed.  

Dispatch an elite corp unit of Phase II Clone Troopers to the battles of the Clone Wars with seven new miniatures to add to your Star Wars: Legion collection!
Four unpainted, uniquely-sculpted Phase II Clone Trooper miniatures and a Phase II Clone Trooper unit leader miniature appear with their standard issue DC-15A blaster rifles.
A Z-6 Phase II Trooper and a Phase II Mortar Trooper add extra firepower and customization options to your unit

Star Wars: Legion - AT-ST Unit Expansion.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion - AT-ST Unit Expansion
Star Wars: Legion - AT-ST Unit Expansion.Opis: An AT-ST is an awe-inspiring sight to the average foot soldier. It towers above the battlefield, stalking inimically forward on mechanized legs and raining a hail of fire and death from its laser cannons and powerful weapons systems. With the AT-ST Unit Expansion for Star Wars™: Legion, you’ll find a single finely sculpted, massive AT-ST miniature, which can be assembled to loom over the battlefield and provide a rallying point for your entire army. Alongside this beautiful miniature, you’ll find an assortment of all the unit cards and upgrade cards that you’ll need to fully integrate the AT-ST into the Empire’s war machine—and your armies.

Star Wars Legion - Clone Wars Core Set.Opis: Star Wars Legion - Clone Wars Core Set - to podstawowy zestaw startowy do gry w Star Wars Legion, który przenosi graczy do czasów Wojen Klonów, umożliwiając im zbudowanie własnej armii złożonej z klonów, Jedi i innych postaci.

Star Wars: Legion - Separatist Invasion.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion - Separatist Invasion - Battle Force Starter Set
Star Wars: Legion - Separatist Invasion.Opis:
A 
mighty Separatist Invasion force is your players’ to command with this new 
Battle Force pack for Star 
Wars: Legion! Led by the nefarious General Grievous, this pack puts the 
wide variety of Separatist battle droids and heavy vehicles at players’ 
disposal, including three units of B1 Battle Droids, two units of Droidekas, an 
AAT Trade Federation Battle Tank, and a unit of IG-100 MagnaGuards. Accompanying 
these units are three new Command Cards for use exclusively by the Invasion 
Force as well as reprints of General Grievous’ three Command Cards and copies of 
the four generic Command Cards.

Star Wars Legion: IG-Series Assassin Dro.Nazwa: Star Wars Legion: IG-Series Assassin Droids
Star Wars Legion: IG-Series Assassin Dro.Opis:
Two 
deadly assassin droids make their way into Star Wars: Legion in this new 
Operative Expansion! IG-11 is known for his ability to take down multiple 
targets in a whirlwind of blaster fire. Meanwhile, IG-88 is a rogue assassin 
droid with a reputation for ruthlessly bringing in his targets no matter the 
cost. This expansion puts both of these droids at players’ disposal as 
mercenaries who will also side with Imperials or Rebels without any more qualms 
about their assignments. In addition to their built in functionality, five 
Command Cards give them even more tactical options in battle while two upgrade 
cards give players the freedom to explore two distinct forms of programming with 
IG-11.

Star Wars Legion: Crashed X-Wing Battlef.Opis:
Players 
can add even more thematic flair and play out a unique scenario with this 
Battlefield Expansion for Star Wars: Legion! Featuring four miniatures depicting 
the scattered rubble from a crashed X-wing starfighter, this pack more deeply 
immerses players in the ground battles of a galaxy far, far away with thematic 
terrain. In addition to these miniatures, this pack also includes a Rebel pilot 
miniature that becomes the focal point of a daring rescue mission scenario where 
players battle to salvage the wreckage and rescue the pilot or capture 
them.

Star Wars: Legion - General Veers DE/EN.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion -  General Veers DE/EN
Star Wars: Legion - General Veers DE/EN.Opis:
Star Wars: Legion - General Veers to niesamowita figura dowódcza, która nie może zabraknąć w Twojej kolekcji! Ten genialny i zdeterminowany oficer Cesarskiej Armii Galaktycznej jest doskonałym dodatkiem do Twojej armii w Star Wars: Legion.

General Maximilian Veers, znany ze swoich umiejętności taktycznych i niezłomnej determinacji, jest znakomitym dowódcą na polu bitwy. Jego doświadczenie i strategiczne umiejętności uczynią Twoje oddziały jeszcze bardziej efektywnymi w walce z Rebeliantami.

Star Wars: Legion - Premium Trooper Base.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion - Premium Trooper Bases
Star Wars: Legion - Premium Trooper Base.Opis:
Enhance 
the look of your Star Wars™: Legion soldiers by placing them on premium plastic 
bases! The Premium Trooper Bases pack contains 32 premium 27-mm round bases that 
can be used to upgrade trooper units such as Stormtroopers or Rebel Troopers. 
The bases contained in the pack include four copies of eight unique sculpts, 
carefully designed to look like environments at home in the Star Wars galaxy, 
while their neutral gray tone of plastic gives you the opportunity to paint and 
customize your bases to fit your army's style.

Star Wars: Legion - Darth Vader Operativ.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion - Darth Vader Operative Expansion

Star Wars: Legion - Luke Skywalker Opera.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion - Luke Skywalker Operative Expansion

Star Wars: Legion - AT-ST Walker Expansi.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion - AT-ST Walker Expansion
Star Wars: Legion - AT-ST Walker Expansi.Opis:
The intimidating Imperial AT-ST returns to Star Wars: Legion! Featuring new engineering that allows for a better assembly experience, the AT-ST in this pack adds firepower to any army.

Additionally, the miniature in this pack now features new customization options, allowing players to assemble it with General Weiss or Chewbacca in the top hatch. Finally, this pack includes both the Imperial unit card and the Chewbacca unit card found in Logray & Wicket, inviting players to explore all the possibilities this unit has to offer right away.

Star Wars: Legion - Logray & Wicket Comm.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion - Logray & Wicket Commander Expansion
Star Wars: Legion - Logray & Wicket Comm.Opis:
Two heroic Ewoks come to Star Wars: Legion to help bring down the Empire in this pack! The brave and resourceful Wicket W. Warrick and Logray proved instrumental in helping the Rebels bring down the Imperial shield generator during the battle of Endor and this pack adds these iconic Ewoks as new Commander choices for Rebel armies and the new Bright Tree Village Battle Force.

In addition to miniatures of these characters and their unit cards, this pack also provides players with new unit cards for C-3PO and Chewbacca that reflect their time on Endor during Return of the Jedi, giving players even more ways to use them in battle! Finally, five upgrade cards round out this pack, inviting players to further customize their Ewok forces.

Star Wars: Legion - Ewok Warriors Unit E.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion - Ewok Warriors Unit Expansion
Star Wars: Legion - Ewok Warriors Unit E.Opis:
An iconic race joins the Rebel cause in this new pack for Star Wars: Legion! Natives of the forest moon of Endor, Ewoks may be short of stature and limited to primitive technology, but they are quick learners who cannot be underestimated.

This pack adds a unit of six Ewoks and two unit cards that let players decide if they're armed with slings or spears to players' Rebel armies or the new Bright Tree Village Battle Force. Joining them are an Axe Ewok miniature that can fill the unit’s heavy weapon slot and an Ewok Trapper miniature that can fill its personnel slot. Rounding out this pack are five upgrade cards that give players options for customizing their Ewoks to fit their own play style.

Star Wars Legion: Paploo's Wild Ride OP.Nazwa: Star Wars Legion: Paploo's Wild Ride OP Kit

Star Wars Legion: Geonosian Warriors - U.Nazwa: Star Wars Legion: Geonosian Warriors - Unit Expansion
Star Wars Legion: Geonosian Warriors - U.Opis: Geonosian Warriors join the Separatist cause in this new expansion for ​​Star Wars: Legion! Relying on their sturdy exoskeletons to protect them from harm and their great numbers to swarm their opponents, Geonosian Warriors are an imposing new Corps option for the Separatist Alliance.

Star Wars Legion: Sun Fac and Poggle the.Nazwa: Star Wars Legion: Sun Fac and Poggle the Lesser - Commander and Operative Expansion
Star Wars Legion: Sun Fac and Poggle the.Opis: Two high-ranking Geonosians lead the warriors of the hive into battle in this new expansion for Star Wars: Legion! Poggle the Lesser has the vast resources of the Geonosian droid factories at his disposal and this pack brings him to Separatist Alliance armies as a new commander option. He is joined by his loyal lieutenant Sun Fac, who is ready to carry out Poggle the Lesser's will as a Separatist Operative.

Star Wars Legion: Fifth Brother & Sevent.Nazwa: Star Wars Legion: Fifth Brother & Seventh Sister Operative Expansion

Star Wars: Legion - Republic Clone Comma.Nazwa: Star Wars: Legion - Republic Clone Commandos
Star Wars: Legion - Republic Clone Comma.Opis: The Galactic Republic's elite Clone Commandos enter Star Wars: Legion in this pack! As the preeminent soldiers of the Grand Army of the Republic, Clone Commandos are deployed to the most dangerous missions and this pack adds a unit of four Clone Commandos to players' collections. Two unit cards allow these miniatures to be deployed as either a standard Support Unit or as the renowed Delta Squad. Additionally, two upgrade cards make the Clone Commandos even more hearty with their signature Katarn Pattern Armor and give them even more tactical flexibility with two configurations for their DC-17m ICWS Blaster Carbines.

Star Wars: Legion - Range Troopers.Opis: Fearsome Imperial Range Troopers arrive in Star Wars: Legion in this new pack! The seven Range Trooper miniatures in this pack give players a durable new Imperial Special Forces option that can stride into the thick of battle while unleashing their powerful E-10R Blaster Rifles. These miniatures are joined by a heavy weapon miniature that further accentuates the unit's potent firepower. Able to easily traverse difficult terrain, the Range Troopers are accompanies by six upgrade cards that invite players to augment them to fit their own strategy.

Star Wars Legion 2.0: Legion Attack Dice.Nazwa: Star Wars Legion 2.0: Legion Attack Dice Pack
Star Wars Legion 2.0: Legion Attack Dice.Opis:
Wyposaż swoją grę Star Wars Legion w wygodne narzędzie - dodatkowe kości! Zestaw Star Wars Legion 2.0: Legion Attack Dice Pack zawiera 16 kości, w tym:

6 białych kości ataku,
6 czarnych kości ataku,
4 czerwone kości ataku.

Star Wars Legion 2.0: Legion Defense Dic.Nazwa: Star Wars Legion 2.0: Legion Defense Dice Pack
Star Wars Legion 2.0: Legion Defense Dic.Opis:
Wyposaż swoją grę Star Wars Legion w wygodne narzędzie - dodatkowe kości! Zestaw Star Wars Legion 2.0: Legion Defense Dice Pack zawiera 16 kości, w tym:

10 białych kości obrony,
6 czerwonych kości obrony.

Star Wars Legion: Imperial Riot Control.Nazwa: Star Wars Legion: Imperial Riot Control Squad - Unit Expansion
Star Wars Legion: Imperial Riot Control.Opis: This expansion for Star Wars™: Legion contains 7 finely sculpted Imperial Riot Control Squad miniatures, enough for one Corps unit, along with new unit and upgrade cards to ensure peace and prosperity across the galaxy. The squad brings a mix of solid ranged combat using its e-11s with stronger durability and close combat power thanks to its electro batons and the protection offered by the squad's riot shields.

Star Wars Legion: Rebel Sleeper Cell - U.Nazwa: Star Wars Legion: Rebel Sleeper Cell - Unit Expansion
Star Wars Legion: Rebel Sleeper Cell - U.Opis: This expansion for Star Wars™: Legion contains 8 finely sculpted Sleeper Cell trooper miniatures, enough for one Special Forces unit, along with new unit and upgrade cards to surprise any adversary. The Rebel Cell uses stealth to close in on their foes where their assortment of demolitions and other sabotage work best.

Necromunda - Hive War.Opis:
Necromunda: Hive War - Necromunda to świat kopalni, fabryk, rafinerii i 
zakładów przetwórczych. Planeta jest ogromną potęgą przemysłową, wytwarzającą 
tysiące różnych produktów, zasobów i dóbr do wykorzystania w pobliskich układach 
planetarnych. W ciemnościach underhive - podziemi wielkich kompleksów 
fabrycznych, potężnych miast miast fortec, dochodzi do walki między 
gangsterskimi domami klanowymi o ograniczone zasoby dostępne dla wyrzutków 
społecznych planety. Te walki są jedynym sposobem na życie mieszkańców 
underhive’ów Necromundy.Necromunda: Hive War - Wskocz do świata potyczek w 
grze bitewnej  Necromunda: Hive War. Wybierz swój gang i walcz w 
ekscytujących, szybkich grach taktycznych, których akcja toczy się w 
ciemnościach underhive’ów. Ten zestaw pudełkowy jest idealny dla nowych graczy i 
zawiera wszystkie zasady, modele i akcesoria potrzebne do rozpoczęcia gry. 
Oprócz dwóch gangów, pudełko zawiera również wystarczająco dużo terenu, aby 
zbudować własny mały zakątek miasta Necromunda.Necromunda: Hive War - Zestaw 
pudełkowy zawiera:20 plastikowych figurek, każda z okrągłą podstawą 25 mm 
:- 10 członków gangu Eschera- 10 członków gangu Delaque- Szereg 
modułowych terenów- Dwustronna mata do gier- Wszystkie kości, żetony, 
karty i szablony potrzebne do gryDołączono również 104-stronicowy podręcznik 
w miękkiej oprawie zawierający:- Tło planety Necromunda i jej domów- 
Zasady grania w gry Necromunda- Wiele scenariuszy do przejścia- Zasady 
tworzenia własnego gangu- Zasady dotyczące broni i osprzętu bojowego 
dostępnego dla gangów

Necromunda: Escher Weapons & Upgrades.Opis:
Escher Weapons & UpgradesMistrzowie farmaceutyków i manipulacji 
chemicznej, czego gangowi Escher może brakować pod względem surowej siły 
fizycznej, nadrabiają szybkością, umiejętnościami i zabójczym talentem. Broń i 
sprzęt używany przez gang Eschera podkreślają ich mocne strony i zabójcze 
umiejętności.Ulepsz swoich wojowników Eschera za pomocą zestawu 
śmiercionośnej broni, która pozwoli ci stworzyć naprawdę wyjątkowy i potężny 
gang. W zestawie znajdują się również alternatywne głowy i ramiona, co oznacza, 
że ​​możesz jeszcze bardziej spersonalizować swój gang.Ten 78-częściowy 
plastikowy zestaw zawiera:– 2x Flamer– 2x Meltagun– 2x Plasma 
Gun– 2x Shotgun– 2x Needle Pistol– 2x Heavy Stubber– 2x Needle 
Rifle– 2x Autopistol– 2x Hand Flamer– 2x Power Sword– 2x 
Chainsword– 2x Stub Gun– 10x Alternative Hair– 10x Alternative

2x Punching Fist ArmTe części są kompatybilne z zestawem Escher Gang oraz

Necromunda: Goliath Weapons & Upgrades.Opis:

Goliata, to potężne bestie, z których każdy jest filarem siły i stłumionej 
przemocy, gotowej do wyzwolenia. Broń i sprzęt, których używają, odzwierciedlają 
tę brutalność.Ulepsz swoich wojowników Goliath, korzystając z wyboru

zestaw zawiera:– 2x Flamer– 2x Meltagun– 2x Boltgun– 2x 
Shotgun– 2x Maul– 2x Brute Cleaver– 2x Two-handed Hammer– 2x 
Two-handed Axe– 2x Hand Flamer– 2x Bolt Pistol– 10x Alternative

Arm– 2x Cigar Hand ArmTe części są kompatybilne z zestawem Goliath Gang

Necromunda: Cawdor Gang Cards.Opis:
Cawdor Gang Tactics Cards - Uwolnij gniew Domu Wiary za pomocą tych 26 
przydatnych kart referencyjnych, reprezentujących niezliczone sztuczki i 
schematy, które można wykorzystać, aby uzyskać przewagę w podludziu. Oprócz 18 
kart taktyk specyficznych dla gangów, które doskonale opisują sposób walki Rodu 
Cawdor, jest też 8 pustych kart wojowników, dzięki którym możesz śledzić swój 
gang.To pudełko zawiera 26 kart 100mm x 75mm do wykorzystania w grach 
Necromunda:– 18x kart Taktyk dla gangów Cawdor– 8x Puste karty 
WojownikówPotrzebujesz kopii Necromunda: Rulebook i Necromunda: House of 
Faith, aby korzystać z zawartości tego zestawu.

Necromunda: House of Faith.Opis:
Necromunda: House of Faith - Z zewnątrz inni Nekromundczycy postrzegają 
Dom Cawdor jako zbieraczy kości, padlinożerców i żebraków, niewiele lepszych niż 
szczury. Ale Dom Cawdor ma wiarę, wiarę tak silną, że została uratowana przed 
zagładą, podczas gdy tak wiele innych Domów Klanów uległo upływowi czasu lub 
innym nieszczęściom. Zdobądź kompletny przewodnik po Domu Cawdor. Ta 
136-stronicowa książka w twardej oprawie zawiera ostateczną historię Domu i 
zasady wystawiania ośmiu różnych typów wojowników dostępnych dla Domu Cawdor - 
Strażników Słowa, Kapłanów, Ognistych, Diakonów, Braci Cawdor, Braci 
Redemptionist, Bonepickers i Zealots. Jest idealny dla fanów House Cawdor lub 
każdego, kto chce zagłębić się w ciemną stronę podziemnego ula.Necromunda: 
House of Faith - W tej książce znajdziesz:– Historia i tło rodu Cawdorów: 
rozległe i obszerne tło na temat początków rodu Cawdor i tego, jak stał się 
największym klanem na Necromundzie.– Lista gangów Cawdorów: Wszystkie 
zasady, których potrzebujesz, aby wystawić gang Cawdorów w grach Necromunda, w 
tym zasady korzystania z Redemptionistów w swoich gangach lub zakładania gangów 
stworzonych wyłącznie z tych płonących fanatyków.– Hangers-on and Brutes: 
Zasady zatrudniania Hangers-on i Brutes do swojego gangu, w tym tych 
specyficznych dla Cawdora i używania ich w grach Necromunda.– Hired Guns: 
Zasady korzystania z Łowców Nagród, Agentów Domowych i Szumowiny Uli.– Silne 
sojusze: Zasady zawierania sojuszy z trzema organizacjami, z którymi Dom Cawdor 
ma powiązania, w tym z Gildią Zwłok, Rogue Factoria i Domem Ko'iron – 
Szlachetnym Domem, który wspiera Dom Wiary.– Dodatkowe zasady: Ta sekcja 
zawiera nowe i dodatkowe zasady, z których mogą korzystać gangi Rodu Cawdor w 
grach Necromunda, zapewniając graczom Cawdor wiele opcji, w tym umiejętności, 
zdolności i teren charakterystyczny dla gangu.– Tabela referencyjna broni: 
obszerna tabela referencyjna broni dla wszystkich rodzajów broni i sprzętu 
bojowego dostępnych dla domu Cawdor i jego sojuszników.– Taktyka gangów rodu 
Cawdorów: tabela D66 dotycząca taktyk gangów do wykorzystania w 
scenariuszach.– Dramatis Personae: Zasady zatrudniania i używania czterech 
zupełnie nowych postaci Dramatis Personae w grach Necromunda.Jest to 
rozszerzenie do Necromundy – do korzystania z zawartości tej książki będziesz 
potrzebować egzemplarza instrukcji Necromunda lub instrukcji Necromunda: Dark 
Uprising.

Necromunda: Cawdor Redemptionists.Opis:
Cawdor Redemptionists - Sekta Redemptionistów wierzy, że Ludzkość spadła 
ze ścieżki prawości ogłoszonej przez Boga-Imperatora i że grzechy ludzkości 
utopią Imperium w brudzie i zepsuciu. Dopóki ludzkość nie będzie w stanie 
kontrolować swojej grzesznej natury, nie będzie w stanie zjednoczyć się i podbić 
gwiazd, tak jak naprawdę chce tego Imperator. Grzech musi zostać oczyszczony ze 
wszystkich ogniem, krwią i wiarą, a Odkupiciele są z tego powodu bardzo 
szczęśliwi.Cawdor Redemptionists - Rozbuduj swój gang Cawdor o tych sześciu 
wojowników lub rozpocznij własną krucjatę Redemptionist. Kapłan Redemptor jest 
przywódcą gangu, a za nim do walki podąża jego Deacon (czempion gangu), trzech 
Braci (Gangers) i Zelota (Juve). Niezależnie od tego, czy wyślesz ich jako 
własny gang, czy dodasz ich do istniejących bojowników Cawdor, ich unikalna broń 
wkrótce pomoże ci oczyścić underhive z grzechu.Cawdor Redemptionists - Ten 
76-częściowy plastikowy zestaw zapewnia:– 2x Odkupiciel Kapłan lub 
Bracia– 2x Diakon lub Bracia– 2x Zelota lub BraciaJest dostarczany z 
okrągłymi podstawkami 25mm. Zasady korzystania z tych modeli w grach Necromunda 
można znaleźć w dodatku House of Faith.

- Kompletna banda Gwardii Sepulkralnej - grupa szkieletowych wojowników składająca się z siedmiu wciskanych modeli odlanych z plastiku w kolorze kości, a także kart wojowników i pełnej talii kart Rivals, które pozwalają wykorzystać ich moc w bitwie.
- 2 dwustronne, rozkładane plansze do gry, które można wykorzystać do tworzenia pól bitewnych.
- Żetony Warhammer Underworlds, w tym cele, znaczniki ran, punkty chwały i wiele innych.
- 8 kości - 5 kości ataku i 3 kości obrony, wystarczające do zadawania najbardziej niszczycielskich ciosów i desperackiej obrony!

Warhammer Underworlds: Grinkrak's Loonco.Opis:
Zestaw zawiera:
- 7x push-fit Grinkrak’s Looncourt miniatures
- 7x double-sided fighter cards
- 1x Grinkrak’s Looncourt Warband Background / Rivals Deck Card
Talia rywali składająca się z 32 kart:
- 12x Grinkrak’s Looncourt objective cards
- 10x Grinkrak’s Looncourt gambit cards
- 10x Grinkrak’s Looncourt upgrade cards

Warhammer Underworlds: Gryselle's Arenai.Opis:
Warhammer Underworlds: Gryselle's Arenai to rozszerzenie do popularnej gry planszowej Warhammer Underworlds, które przenosi graczy do tajemniczej i mrocznej krainy, zwaną Beastgrave.

W zestawie znajdują się karty i modele do gry dla dwóch nowych frakcji: Morgwaeth's Blade-Coven oraz Grymwatch. Każda z frakcji ma swoje unikalne umiejętności i strategie, co pozwala na wiele wariantów rozgrywki. Dodatkowo, zestaw zawiera również nowe karty do ulepszania istniejących frakcji oraz nowe zasady i przeszkody, które wprowadzają nowe wyzwania dla graczy.

Warhammer Underworlds: Gryselle's Arenai to idealny wybór dla fanów gier planszowych, którzy chcą rozbudować swoją kolekcję i doświadczyć nowych frakcji i wyzwań. Dodatek ten oferuje wiele możliwości dla bardziej zaawansowanych graczy, jak i dla początkujących, którzy chcą poznać świat gry Warhammer Underworlds.

Gnarlwood: Beastbound Assualt.Opis:
Gnarlwood: Beastbound Assault to rozszerzenie do gry Warhammer Age of Sigmar, które umożliwia graczom przeprowadzenie epickich bitew w tajemniczej i niebezpiecznej krainie Gnarlwood.

W zestawie znajdują się modele do gry dla dwóch nowych frakcji: Sylwety i Gniewne Bestie, a każda z nich ma swoje unikalne umiejętności i strategie. Gracze będą musieli wykorzystać całą swoją wiedzę i doświadczenie, aby pokonać przeciwnika i osiągnąć zwycięstwo.

Dodatkowo, zestaw zawiera również nowe karty, które pozwalają na ulepszanie istniejących frakcji oraz wprowadzają nowe zasady i przeszkody, co pozwala na jeszcze bardziej złożoną rozgrywkę.

Gnarlwood: Beastbound Assault to idealny wybór dla fanów gry Warhammer Age of Sigmar, którzy chcą rozszerzyć swoją kolekcję i doświadczyć nowych frakcji i wyzwań. Rozszerzenie to oferuje wiele możliwości dla bardziej zaawansowanych graczy, jak i dla początkujących, którzy chcą poznać świat gry Warhammer Age of Sigmar.

Zondara's Gravebreakers.Opis: Zondara and Ferlain have had their love torn apart by a terrible curse that has turned Ferlain into a snarling fiend. Calling on the bestial magic of Ghur and the forbidden power of necromancy, Zondara has raised a band of animated corpses to plunder the glacial depths of the Deathgorge and discover some way of returning her lover to his previous state. This new warband comes with a Rivals deck that uses undead thralls to unearth powerful upgrades for Zondara and Ferlain.

Rimelocked Relics.Opis: Some say that the ancient ice encasing the blood-magic artefacts deep with the Deathgorge can be thawed out through the shedding of blood in combat. Rimelocked Relics breathes frosty new life into your warbands with special Rimelocked upgrades whose powerful abilities must be coaxed out with Thaw counters across the game. As this deck doesn’t come with any Gambit spell cards, it can be used by any warband in the game.

Kill Team: Adeptus Astartes Dice Set.Nazwa: Kill Team: Adeptus Astartes Dice Set

Kill Team: Ork Kommandos Dice Set.Nazwa: Kill Team: Ork Kommandos Dice Set

Kill Team - Phobos Strike Team Dice.Nazwa: Kill Team - Phobos Strike Team Dice

Kill Team Codex: Into The Dark (ENG).Nazwa: Kill Team Codex: Into The Dark (ENG)

Aeldari Blades of Khaine.Opis: Zanurz się w epickim świecie Warhammer 40,000 z zestawem "Kill Team: Blades of Khaine " od Games Workshop. Ten elitarny oddział Aeldari powstał żeby zapobiegać wszelkim zagrożeniom dotyczącym losów ich frakcji. Ci szkoleni zabójcy potrafią dniami podążać za swoją potencjalną ofiarą, a uzbrojni w miecze spalinowe i "mandiblasters" niosą śmierć jeszcza zanim ofiara się zorientuje.Zestaw można również wykorzystać do armi warhammer 40 000.

Kill Team: Hivestorm.Opis: Zanurz się w epickim świecie Warhammer Kill Team z nowym zestawem Kill team Hivestorm! Zestaw otwiera całkiem nową edycję tej wspaniałej gry, zaopatrując we wszystko co niezbędne żeby rozpocząć grę już teraz!Zestaw zawiera:

Kill Team: Upgrade Equipment Pack.Opis: Ten zestaw zawiera w sobie 30 komponentów podstawowego i uniwersalnego ekwipunku niezbędnego do wyposażenia swoich Kill Teamów na polu bitwy.Zestaw zawiera:

Kill Team: Space Marine Scout Squad.Nazwa: Kill Team: Space Marine Scout Squad
Kill Team: Space Marine Scout Squad.Opis: Ten zestaw zmodyfikowanych genetycznie wojowników, choć jeszcze nie w pełni wykształconych adeptus astartes, to oddział elitarnych zwiadowców dostosowanych do przeżycia nawet w jednych z najcięższych warunków. Ciężko uzbrojeni tworzą oddział specjalistów przystosowany do realizowania wielu niebezpiecznych zadań.

Kill Team: Space Marine Scout Squad Data.Nazwa: Kill Team: Space Marine Scout Squad Datacards

Kill Team: Ork Kommandos.Opis: WAAAAAAGH!!! Zanurz się w krwiożerczym świecie Warhammer Kill Team z tym niesamowitym zestawem Orczych Kommando! Te istoty pradawnego pochodzenia żyją tylko żeby walczyć i dobrze się przy tym bawić, a ci którzy byli w stanie przeżyć parę takich bitek mają na tyle doświadczenia by specjalizować się w różnych dziedzinach mordu, tym właśnie są Orcze Kommando!

Kill Team: Nemesis Claw.Opis: Przed herezją czy po, Chapter Night Lords wiedział dokładnie co robić żeby zasiać nie strach a przerażenie w oczach prostych ludzi. Ich obecność zwiastowała śmierć brutalną, krwawą i pełną bólu nie do wytrzymania. Przeciwstawienie się Imperatorowi zrzuciła z nich ostatnie ograniczenia, więc skomponuj ten oddział specjalistów z koszmaru, i spowij pole bitwy krwią swoich wrogów w najbardziej z brutalnych sposobów!

- 1x dwustronną planszę do gry o wymiarach 30" na 22"
- 16x filarów
- 4x zakończenia ścian
- 4x krótkie ściany z włazem i filarami

- 2x krótkie ściany z włazem
- 2x długie ściany z filarami
- 2x długie ściany z włazem
- 2x długie ściany
Ten zestaw zawiera 108 plastikowych elementów.
